content.prompt: Which of the following developments facilitated the family situation portrayed in Brandesâ€™ sketch?

choices.label: The recruitment of new bureaucratic elites by Muslim states in Southeast Asia

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
